This is a multi-thread issue posted in the news group. The openReportDesign() method on reportEngine should support multi-thread environment, i.e, different worker threads in the BIRT engine caller application should be able to use the same report engine instance to open a report design simultaneously. We need to have this fixed for BIRT 2.0. 

Hello,

Can I use BIRT in a multi-thread environment ?

When i try to use it, i have a:
java.lang.NullPointerException
at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.model.parser.StructureState.createStructure(StructureState.java:347)
..
at 
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportEngine.openReportDesign(ReportEngine.java:216)

on my code :IReportRunnable birtReport = 
engine.openReportDesign(reportFile);
Revised StructureState so that it can support multi-thread applications.
